title: Cucumber Soup with Tomatoes Recipe
description: This five-ingredient recipe for cucumber soup with tomatoes is a quick and refreshing summertime lunch or dinner.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Cucumber Soup with Tomatoes 3.5 (4) 4 Reviews 4 Photos Healthy five-ingredient cucumber soup that is delicious and refreshing. Submitted by JRELERJR Updated on January 14, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 4 4 4 Prep Time: 15 mins Additional Time: 30 mins Total Time: 45 mins Servings: 4 Yield: 4 servings Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 cucumbers - peeled, quartered, and seeded 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth 1 cup chopped tomato ¼ cup fresh lime juice ⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper Directions Place 2 cucumbers in a blender; pour in chicken stock. Blend cucumber mixture until smooth and pureed; pour cucumber puree into a large bowl. Chop the remaining 2 cucumbers. Stir chopped cucumbers, tomato, lime juice, and cayenne pepper into pureed cucumber until well mixed. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes. Add Your Photo Photos of Cucumber Soup with Tomatoes 01 of 04 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 04 Photo by  bonnie 06/27/2020 We really liked it. Nice bit of zing with the lime & the cayenne combo gave it good flavor. First, I really hate when people “review” a recipe after having TOTALLY changed it. That being said, I only had lemon cucumbers instead of regular ones. So I used 3 blended & 1 diced of those. No “seeding” necessary w/ those little ones. I also didn’t have chicken stock, so I used chicken broth. After tasting it as the recipe called for, it was good...but was missing the creamy element. I happen to have a bit of our family’s “creamy pesto” (nearly equal portions of sour cream & a little more pesto mixed together) leftover that I had used w/ another dinner so I threw that in. Only about 1/3 cup of the creamy pesto & it took this recipe way over the top. So good. Will definitely make it again the way I did it with the lemon cucumbers & creamy pesto added. Super refreshing & light. My husband made me tell him the ingredients about 4 times because he didn’t believe that it was so simple & yet so flavorful. 03 of 04 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 08/09/2015 The pure, cool, sweet flavors of fresh tomatoes and cucumbers make this ideal for those hot summer days. I used English cucumbers for this along with farmers market fresh tomatoes. 04 of 04 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 08/09/2015 The pure, cool, sweet flavors of fresh tomatoes and cucumbers make this ideal for those hot summer days. I used English cucumbers for this along with farmers market fresh tomatoes. 1 You’ll Also Love Pota Brata (Irish Flag Soup) 5 Ratings Simple Sweet Potato Soup 27 Ratings Dill Gazpacho 63 Ratings Fresh Watermelon Gazpacho 3 Ratings Smooth Broccoli Vitamix Soup 18 Ratings Black Bean Chili 364 Ratings Butternut Squash-Sweet Potato Ginger Bisque 55 Ratings Loaded Black-Eyed Peas, Spinach, and Vegetable Soup 14 Ratings Spinach and Leek White Bean Soup 476 Ratings Green Gazpacho 56 Ratings Winter Harvest Curry Stew 5 Ratings Grandma's Slow Cooker Vegetarian Chili 982 Ratings Vegan Borscht 21 Ratings Not-Too-Sweet Sweet Potato Soup 1 Rating Veggie Vegetarian Chili 318 Ratings Minestrone Soup 113 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: JRELERJR
instructions: Place 2 cucumbers in a blender; pour in chicken stock. Blend cucumber mixture until smooth and pureed; pour cucumber puree into a large bowl.;Chop the remaining 2 cucumbers. Stir chopped cucumbers, tomato, lime juice, and cayenne pepper into pureed cucumber until well mixed. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
